pydantic_tut module

class pydantic_tut.Address(*, city: Annotated[str, Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=100)], country: Annotated[str, Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=100)], pin_code: Annotated[int, Strict(strict=True)])[source]

Bases: BaseModel

city: Annotated[str, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='City Name', description='Enter name of the city for address', metadata=[Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=100)])]
country: Annotated[str, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Counry Name', description='Enter name of the country for address', metadata=[Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=100)])]
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

pin_code: Annotated[int, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Pin Code', description='Enter pin code of relevant area', examples=[1124, 54090, 110124629], metadata=[Strict(strict=True)])]
classmethod validate_pinCode(value: int)[source]
class pydantic_tut.Patient(*, name: Annotated[str, Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=50)], age: Annotated[int, Strict(strict=True), Gt(gt=0)], allergies: Annotated[List[str] | None, MaxLen(max_length=3)] = None, contacts: Dict[str, int], email: EmailStr, height: Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0.55)], weight: Annotated[float, Gt(gt=2.5)], address: Address)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

address: Address, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Address', description='Enter Address of Patient according to given Address Model Format', examples=[{'city': 'Lahore', 'country': 'Pakistan', 'pin_code': 54126}])]
age: Annotated[int, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Age', description='Enter age of Patient which is not a negative value', metadata=[Strict(strict=True), Gt(gt=0)])]
allergies: Annotated[List[str] | None, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=False, default=None, title='Allergies List', description='Enter atmost 3 Allergies of a Patient', metadata=[MaxLen(max_length=3)])]
property bmi: float
classmethod check_emergency_contact(model)[source]
contacts: Annotated[Dict[str, int], FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Contacts List', description='Enter Patients Contact Info.', examples=['+92-XXX-XXXXXXX'])]
email: Annotated[EmailStr, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Email', description='Enter email of a Patient')]
height: Annotated[float, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Height', description='Enter Patient Height in meters', metadata=[Gt(gt=0.55)])]
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

name: Annotated[str, FieldInfo(annotation=NoneType, required=True, title='Name', description='Enter name of the Patient with Max 50 Characters Allowed', examples=['Abish', 'Ali'], metadata=[Strict(strict=True), MaxLen(max_length=50)])]
